means: 阿米尼乌斯（德国英雄， （公元 9年），在其率领下在条顿堡加森林击败罗马人的三个军团，因而将德国人从罗马统治下解放出来 ）

sentence.Network_en: Arminius also came to a sticky end, murdered by his own troops.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿米尼乌斯也死得很惨，被自己的部下害死了。

sentence.Network_en: Arminius is misrepresented as teaching the absolute freedom of the will.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿明尼乌被曲解教导人类绝对的自由意志.

sentence.Network_en: Arminius is misrepresented concerning total depravity.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿明尼乌有关全然败坏的观点被曲解.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Arminius also came to a sticky end, murdered by his own troops.阿米尼乌斯也死得很惨，被自己的部下害死了。

means.word_mean: 1. Dutch Protestant theologian who founded Arminianism which opposed the absolute predestinarianism of John Calvin (1559-1609)
2. German hero; leader at the battle of Teutoburger Wald in AD 9 (circa 18 BC - AD 19)
